attributes.action: Let the Gurkhas soldiers live in Britian
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think the goverment should let the Gurkhas live in Britian as they have fought for this country for nearly 200 years, they are good enough to fight for our queen then get kicked out of britain, I dont think our goverment or our queen truely apprechitate the work they do for us. If they can fight along side our boys then they should have the same rights and benefits that our forces get, it is only fair.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
